Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
desensitized \desensitized\ adj. rendered insensitive.
Syn: deadened. [WordNet 1.5]

desensitized adj 1: made less sensitive; "desensitized to the allergen"; "desensitized photographic film is less sensitive to light" [syn: {desensitised}] 2: rendered emotionally insensitive; "a desensitized public indifferent to the violence in films" [syn: {desensitised}]
